resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
The account you created is invalid. Please check it again.
You are currently connected with a roaming mobile connection. Therefore, no photos will be downloaded as this can incur significant costs
You are currently connected with a mobile non-wifi connection. In order to download photos, please change the relevant setting
Cannot download photos as no internet connection was detected. Please check your network connection and try again
Number of seconds must be between 1 and 300
Please enter a valid number (minimum 1, maximum 300)
Number of seconds must be between 1 and 120
Please enter a valid number (minimum 1, maximum 120)
Are you sure you want to delete the cached photos?
Click to delete cached photos (will be downloaded again during next run).

Crawler is an image viewing app which uses open source components. You can find the source code of the open source projects along with their license information below. I acknowledge and am grateful to these developers for their contributions to the open source movement. 

Project: Universal Image Loader 
https://github.com/nostra13/Android-Universal-Image-Loader 
Copyright © 2013 Sergey Tarasevich. All rights reserved. 
License (Apache) 
https://github.com/nostra13/Android-Universal-Image-Loader/blob/master/LICENSE

https://github.com/MikeOrtiz/TouchImageView 
Copyright © 2012 Michael Ortiz. All rights reserved. 
License 
https://github.com/MikeOrtiz/TouchImageView/blob/master/LICENSE
